item.title: What's New in Next 13
item.description: Create new next project using typescript npx create-next-app@latest --ts app-name Basic URL structure about -> example/about [slug] -> example/{slug} (group_name) -> example Layout layout only will be implemented on the current sub directory a good place to do data fetching All is Server Component since next13, all compponent is server component by default. So it will be cache if the url is not dynamic, to prevent this can use below way:
